item.title: #267 My simple podcasting process
item.description: In this episode, I share how I reinvented my podcasting process to make it as efficient as possible. I used to rely on an employee to handle everything, but now I’ve found tools that allow me to record, transcribe, edit, and publish a podcast all from my phone in less than 10 minutes. From using the Dolby On app for recording to Happy Scribe for transcription and ChatGPT for polishing the content, I’ve streamlined everything... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/f5d5ca0/podcast/rss

item.title: Unlocked Interview: Build a Fighting NALC
item.description: We are joined by C Moline a coordinating committee member of Build a Fighting NALC to talk about the many issues with the current TA that was presented to city postal workers by NALC national. We also go over working conditions for postal workers, international solidarity, and what the near future for NALC members looks like. From the 'Vote No' campaign to rallies in the streets, workers are organizing in the face of it being illegal for them to strike... Feed: https://feed.podbean.com/workstoppage/feed.xml
